The sons<S>1121</S> of Levi<S>3878</S>; Gershon<S>1648</S>, Kohath<S>6955</S>, and Merari<S>4847</S>. <sup>Gershon: or, Gershom</sup>
And the sons<S>1121</S> of Kohath<S>6955</S>; Amram<S>6019</S>, Izhar<S>3324</S>, and Hebron<S>2275</S>, and Uzziel<S>5816</S>.
And the children<S>1121</S> of Amram<S>6019</S>; Aaron<S>175</S>, and Moses<S>4872</S>, and Miriam<S>4813</S>. The sons<S>1121</S> also of Aaron<S>175</S>; Nadab<S>5070</S>, and Abihu<S>30</S>, Eleazar<S>499</S>, and Ithamar<S>385</S>.
Eleazar<S>499</S> begat<S>3205</S> Phinehas<S>6372</S>, Phinehas<S>6372</S> begat<S>3205</S> Abishua<S>50</S>,
And Abishua<S>50</S> begat<S>3205</S> Bukki<S>1231</S>, and Bukki<S>1231</S> begat<S>3205</S> Uzzi<S>5813</S>,
And Uzzi<S>5813</S> begat<S>3205</S> Zerahiah<S>2228</S>, and Zerahiah<S>2228</S> begat<S>3205</S> Meraioth<S>4812</S>,
Meraioth<S>4812</S> begat<S>3205</S> Amariah<S>568</S>, and Amariah<S>568</S> begat<S>3205</S> Ahitub<S>285</S>,
And Ahitub<S>285</S> begat<S>3205</S> Zadok<S>6659</S>, and Zadok<S>6659</S> begat<S>3205</S> Ahimaaz<S>290</S>,
And Ahimaaz<S>290</S> begat<S>3205</S> Azariah<S>5838</S>, and Azariah<S>5838</S> begat<S>3205</S> Johanan<S>3110</S>,
And Johanan<S>3110</S> begat<S>3205</S> Azariah<S>5838</S>, (he it is that executed the priest's office<S>3547</S> in the temple<S>1004</S> that Solomon<S>8010</S> built<S>1129</S> in Jerusalem<S>3389</S>:) <sup>in the temple: Heb. in the house</sup>
And Azariah<S>5838</S> begat<S>3205</S> Amariah<S>568</S>, and Amariah<S>568</S> begat<S>3205</S> Ahitub<S>285</S>,
And Ahitub<S>285</S> begat<S>3205</S> Zadok<S>6659</S>, and Zadok<S>6659</S> begat<S>3205</S> Shallum<S>7967</S>, <sup>Shallum: or, Meshullam</sup>
And Shallum<S>7967</S> begat<S>3205</S> Hilkiah<S>2518</S>, and Hilkiah<S>2518</S> begat<S>3205</S> Azariah<S>5838</S>,
And Azariah<S>5838</S> begat<S>3205</S> Seraiah<S>8304</S>, and Seraiah<S>8304</S> begat<S>3205</S> Jehozadak<S>3087</S>,
And Jehozadak<S>3087</S> went<S>1980</S> into captivity, when the LORD<S>3068</S> carried away<S>1540</S> Judah<S>3063</S> and Jerusalem<S>3389</S> by the hand<S>3027</S> of Nebuchadnezzar<S>5019</S>.
The sons<S>1121</S> of Levi<S>3878</S>; Gershom<S>1647</S>, Kohath<S>6955</S>, and Merari<S>4847</S>. <sup>Gershom: or, Gershon</sup>
And these be the names<S>8034</S> of the sons<S>1121</S> of Gershom<S>1647</S>; Libni<S>3845</S>, and Shimei<S>8096</S>.
And the sons<S>1121</S> of Kohath<S>6955</S> were, Amram<S>6019</S>, and Izhar<S>3324</S>, and Hebron<S>2275</S>, and Uzziel<S>5816</S>.
The sons<S>1121</S> of Merari<S>4847</S>; Mahli<S>4249</S>, and Mushi<S>4187</S>. And these are the families<S>4940</S> of the Levites<S>3881</S> according to their fathers<S>1</S>.
Of Gershom<S>1647</S>; Libni<S>3845</S> his son<S>1121</S>, Jahath<S>3189</S> his son<S>1121</S>, Zimmah<S>2155</S> his son<S>1121</S>,
Joah<S>3098</S> his son<S>1121</S>, Iddo<S>5714</S> his son<S>1121</S>, Zerah<S>2226</S> his son<S>1121</S>, Jeaterai<S>2979</S> his son<S>1121</S>. <sup>Joah: or, Ethan.ver.2.</sup> <sup>Iddo: or, Adaiah.ver.41.</sup>
The sons<S>1121</S> of Kohath<S>6955</S>; Amminadab<S>5992</S> his son<S>1121</S>, Korah<S>7141</S> his son<S>1121</S>, Assir<S>617</S> his son<S>1121</S>, <sup>Amminadab: or, Izahar.ver.2.18.</sup>
Elkanah<S>511</S> his son<S>1121</S>, and Ebiasaph<S>43</S> his son<S>1121</S>, and Assir<S>617</S> his son<S>1121</S>,
Tahath<S>8480</S> his son<S>1121</S>, Uriel<S>222</S> his son<S>1121</S>, Uzziah<S>5818</S> his son<S>1121</S>, and Shaul<S>7586</S> his son<S>1121</S>.
And the sons<S>1121</S> of Elkanah<S>511</S>; Amasai<S>6022</S>, and Ahimoth<S>287</S>.
As for Elkanah<S>511</S>: the sons<S>1121</S> of Elkanah<S>511</S>; Zophai<S>6689</S> his son<S>1121</S>, and Nahath<S>5184</S> his son<S>1121</S>, <sup>Zophai: or, Zuph</sup>
Eliab<S>446</S> his son<S>1121</S>, Jeroham<S>3395</S> his son<S>1121</S>, Elkanah<S>511</S> his son<S>1121</S>.
And the sons<S>1121</S> of Samuel<S>8050</S>; the firstborn<S>1060</S> Vashni<S>2059</S>, and Abiah<S>29</S>. <sup>Vashni: called also Joel</sup>
The sons<S>1121</S> of Merari<S>4847</S>; Mahli<S>4249</S>, Libni<S>3845</S> his son<S>1121</S>, Shimei<S>8096</S> his son<S>1121</S>, Uzza<S>5798</S> his son<S>1121</S>,
Shimea<S>8092</S> his son<S>1121</S>, Haggiah<S>2293</S> his son<S>1121</S>, Asaiah<S>6222</S> his son<S>1121</S>.
And these are they whom David<S>1732</S> set<S>5975</S> over the service<S>3027</S> of song<S>7892</S> in the house<S>1004</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S>, after that the ark<S>727</S> had rest<S>4494</S>.
And they ministered<S>8334</S> before<S>6440</S> the dwelling<S>4908</S> place of the tabernacle<S>168</S> of the congregation<S>4150</S> with singing<S>7892</S>, until Solomon<S>8010</S> had built<S>1129</S> the house<S>1004</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S> in Jerusalem<S>3389</S>: and then they waited<S>5975</S> on their office<S>5656</S> according to their order<S>4941</S>.
And these are they that waited<S>5975</S> with their children<S>1121</S>. Of the sons<S>1121</S> of the Kohathites<S>6956</S>: Heman<S>1968</S> a singer<S>7891</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Joel<S>3100</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Shemuel<S>8050</S>, <sup>waited: Heb. stood</sup>

And his brother<S>251</S> Asaph<S>623</S>, who stood<S>5975</S> on his right hand<S>3225</S>, even Asaph<S>623</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Berachiah<S>1296</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Shimea<S>8092</S>,

The son<S>1121</S> of Jahath<S>3189</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Gershom<S>1647</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Levi<S>3878</S>.
And their brethren<S>251</S> the sons<S>1121</S> of Merari<S>4847</S> stood on the left hand<S>8040</S>: Ethan<S>387</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Kishi<S>7029</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Abdi<S>5660</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Malluch<S>4409</S>, <sup>Kishi: or, Kushaiah</sup>
The son<S>1121</S> of Hashabiah<S>2811</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Amaziah<S>558</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Hilkiah<S>2518</S>,
The son<S>1121</S> of Amzi<S>557</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Bani<S>1137</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Shamer<S>8106</S>,
The son<S>1121</S> of Mahli<S>4249</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Mushi<S>4187</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Merari<S>4847</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Levi<S>3878</S>.
Their brethren<S>251</S> also the Levites<S>3881</S> were appointed<S>5414</S> unto all manner of service<S>5656</S> of the tabernacle<S>4908</S> of the house<S>1004</S> of God<S>430</S>.
But Aaron<S>175</S> and his sons<S>1121</S> offered<S>6999</S> upon the altar<S>4196</S> of the burnt offering<S>5930</S>, and on the altar<S>4196</S> of incense<S>7004</S>, and were appointed for all the work<S>4399</S> of the place most<S>6944</S> holy<S>6944</S>, and to make an atonement<S>3722</S> for Israel<S>3478</S>, according to all that Moses<S>4872</S> the servant<S>5650</S> of God<S>430</S> had commanded<S>6680</S>.
And these are the sons<S>1121</S> of Aaron<S>175</S>; Eleazar<S>499</S> his son<S>1121</S>, Phinehas<S>6372</S> his son<S>1121</S>, Abishua<S>50</S> his son<S>1121</S>,
Bukki<S>1231</S> his son<S>1121</S>, Uzzi<S>5813</S> his son<S>1121</S>, Zerahiah<S>2228</S> his son<S>1121</S>,
Meraioth<S>4812</S> his son<S>1121</S>, Amariah<S>568</S> his son<S>1121</S>, Ahitub<S>285</S> his son<S>1121</S>,
Zadok<S>6659</S> his son<S>1121</S>, Ahimaaz<S>290</S> his son<S>1121</S>.
Now these are their dwelling places<S>4186</S> throughout their castles<S>2918</S> in their coasts<S>1366</S>, of the sons<S>1121</S> of Aaron<S>175</S>, of the families<S>4940</S> of the Kohathites<S>6956</S>: for theirs was the lot<S>1486</S>.
And they gave<S>5414</S> them Hebron<S>2275</S> in the land<S>776</S> of Judah<S>3063</S>, and the suburbs<S>4054</S> thereof round about<S>5439</S> it.
But the fields<S>7704</S> of the city<S>5892</S>, and the villages<S>2691</S> thereof, they gave<S>5414</S> to Caleb<S>3612</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Jephunneh<S>3312</S>.
And to the sons<S>1121</S> of Aaron<S>175</S> they gave<S>5414</S> the cities<S>5892</S> of Judah, namely, Hebron<S>2275</S>, the city of refuge<S>4733</S>, and Libnah<S>3841</S> with her suburbs<S>4054</S>, and Jattir<S>3492</S>, and Eshtemoa<S>851</S>, with their suburbs<S>4054</S>,
And Hilen<S>2432</S> with her suburbs<S>4054</S>, Debir<S>1688</S> with her suburbs<S>4054</S>, <sup>Hilen: or, Holon</sup>
And Ashan<S>6228</S> with her suburbs<S>4054</S>, and Bethshemesh<S>1053</S> with her suburbs<S>4054</S>: <sup>Ashan: or, Ain</sup>
And out of the tribe<S>4294</S> of Benjamin<S>1144</S>; Geba<S>1387</S> with her suburbs<S>4054</S>, and Alemeth<S>5964</S> with her suburbs<S>4054</S>, and Anathoth<S>6068</S> with her suburbs<S>4054</S>. All their cities<S>5892</S> throughout their families<S>4940</S> were thirteen<S>7969</S> <S>6240</S> cities<S>5892</S>. <sup>Alemeth: or, Almon</sup>
And unto the sons<S>1121</S> of Kohath<S>6955</S>, which were left<S>3498</S> of the family<S>4940</S> of that tribe<S>4294</S>, were cities given out of the half<S>2677</S> tribe<S>4294</S>, namely, out of the half<S>4276</S> tribe of Manasseh<S>4519</S>, by lot<S>1486</S>, ten<S>6235</S> cities<S>5892</S>.
And to the sons<S>1121</S> of Gershom<S>1647</S> throughout their families<S>4940</S> out of the tribe<S>4294</S> of Issachar<S>3485</S>, and out of the tribe<S>4294</S> of Asher<S>836</S>, and out of the tribe<S>4294</S> of Naphtali<S>5321</S>, and out of the tribe<S>4294</S> of Manasseh<S>4519</S> in Bashan<S>1316</S>, thirteen<S>7969</S> <S>6240</S> cities<S>5892</S>.
Unto the sons<S>1121</S> of Merari<S>4847</S> were given by lot<S>1486</S>, throughout their families<S>4940</S>, out of the tribe<S>4294</S> of Reuben<S>7205</S>, and out of the tribe<S>4294</S> of Gad<S>1410</S>, and out of the tribe<S>4294</S> of Zebulun<S>2074</S>, twelve<S>8147</S> <S>6240</S> cities<S>5892</S>.
And the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S> gave<S>5414</S> to the Levites<S>3881</S> these cities<S>5892</S> with their suburbs<S>4054</S>.
And they gave<S>5414</S> by lot<S>1486</S> out of the tribe<S>4294</S> of the children<S>1121</S> of Judah<S>3063</S>, and out of the tribe<S>4294</S> of the children<S>1121</S> of Simeon<S>8095</S>, and out of the tribe<S>4294</S> of the children<S>1121</S> of Benjamin<S>1144</S>, these cities<S>5892</S>, which are called<S>7121</S> by their names<S>8034</S>.
And the residue of the families<S>4940</S> of the sons<S>1121</S> of Kohath<S>6955</S> had cities<S>5892</S> of their coasts<S>1366</S> out of the tribe<S>4294</S> of Ephraim<S>669</S>.
And they gave<S>5414</S> unto them, of the cities<S>5892</S> of refuge<S>4733</S>, Shechem<S>7927</S> in mount<S>2022</S> Ephraim<S>669</S> with her suburbs<S>4054</S>; they gave also Gezer<S>1507</S> with her suburbs<S>4054</S>,
And Jokmeam<S>3361</S> with her suburbs<S>4054</S>, and Bethhoron<S>1032</S> with her suburbs<S>4054</S>,
And Aijalon<S>357</S> with her suburbs<S>4054</S>, and Gathrimmon<S>1667</S> with her suburbs<S>4054</S>:
And out of the half<S>4276</S> tribe<S>4294</S> of Manasseh<S>4519</S>; Aner<S>6063</S> with her suburbs<S>4054</S>, and Bileam<S>1109</S> with her suburbs<S>4054</S>, for the family<S>4940</S> of the remnant<S>3498</S> of the sons<S>1121</S> of Kohath<S>6955</S>.
Unto the sons<S>1121</S> of Gershom<S>1647</S> were given out of the family<S>4940</S> of the half<S>2677</S> tribe<S>4294</S> of Manasseh<S>4519</S>, Golan<S>1474</S> in Bashan<S>1316</S> with her suburbs<S>4054</S>, and Ashtaroth<S>6252</S> with her suburbs<S>4054</S>:
And out of the tribe<S>4294</S> of Issachar<S>3485</S>; Kedesh<S>6943</S> with her suburbs<S>4054</S>, Daberath<S>1705</S> with her suburbs<S>4054</S>,
And Ramoth<S>7216</S> with her suburbs<S>4054</S>, and Anem<S>6046</S> with her suburbs<S>4054</S>:
And out of the tribe<S>4294</S> of Asher<S>836</S>; Mashal<S>4913</S> with her suburbs<S>4054</S>, and Abdon<S>5658</S> with her suburbs<S>4054</S>,
And Hukok<S>2712</S> with her suburbs<S>4054</S>, and Rehob<S>7340</S> with her suburbs<S>4054</S>:
And out of the tribe<S>4294</S> of Naphtali<S>5321</S>; Kedesh<S>6943</S> in Galilee<S>1551</S> with her suburbs<S>4054</S>, and Hammon<S>2540</S> with her suburbs<S>4054</S>, and Kirjathaim<S>7156</S> with her suburbs<S>4054</S>.
Unto the rest<S>3498</S> of the children<S>1121</S> of Merari<S>4847</S> were given out of the tribe<S>4294</S> of Zebulun<S>2074</S>, Rimmon<S>7417</S> with her suburbs<S>4054</S>, Tabor<S>8396</S> with her suburbs<S>4054</S>:
And on the other side<S>5676</S> Jordan<S>3383</S> by Jericho<S>3405</S>, on the east side<S>4217</S> of Jordan<S>3383</S>, were given them out of the tribe<S>4294</S> of Reuben<S>7205</S>, Bezer<S>1221</S> in the wilderness<S>4057</S> with her suburbs<S>4054</S>, and Jahzah<S>3096</S> with her suburbs<S>4054</S>,
Kedemoth<S>6932</S> also with her suburbs<S>4054</S>, and Mephaath<S>4158</S> with her suburbs<S>4054</S>:
